title: Dont know how to win
body:
I dont know what to play anymore its like im gonna give up on this game soon i play every game with the intent to win but i end up losing i play my best role lose i play my secoundary role i lose i then get paired up with people that wanna feed intetionally or afk i report but then sadly see them on the same team as me the next game and do the same thing its like the reporting system dosent mean shit. Im floating around the s3 and s4 tier i keep going up and down and its bloody pissing me off i end up on a 10 losing streak then a 10 winning streak and before you know it i realise im achieving jack shit from this and wasting countless hours playing this game especially having 400 rank games in total riot is bloody shit for ranking me up with these kind of people especially when i want to climb but no never happens

Thank you for reading and hearing my complain

Norbit

replies.body: A good idea is to scan your team before the game begins. If you can spot obvious problems, then you can dodge to save LP.
I currently have 1366 ranked games. come feel my pain

I find that if I'm matched up with bad teammates, taking a break for like 5mins can make a difference. Get up, have something to eat / grab a glass of water, then come back. By that time, they've probably got their next game started - and you won't be matched with them.

Alternately, switch game modes. If fighting players isn't fun, have a round of vsAI - earlier this evening, I was matched up with a Tahm Kench ADC who wanted to just mess around and have fun. 
Like, they were a good player so it worked out just fine - and we had a newbie trying to solo top lane, so it was good to go help out the other players as we roflstomped the bots.

If neither of those are working out, close the game for a while. Come back the next day, if you'd like. Do something else that's fun and take time to un-tilt yourself. **Ultimately, your ranking in a videogame is not a measure of your worth as a human being - and is not worth losing your mind over**. :-)

maybe you don't report enough, i'm not joking, sometimes people are so bad there's no space to type anymore in reports or it feels like there's troll teams purposely being weird e.g a match with 4 allies 2+ deaths already in 5min of start
